Pattern.name: Builder
Pattern.Desc: Separate the construction of a complex object from its representation so that the same construction process can create different representations.

Node.name: Builder
Node.Desc: Specifies an abstract interface for creating parts of a Product object.

Node.name: Director
Node.Desc: Constructs an object using the Builder interface.

Node.name: ConcreteBuilder
Node.Desc: Constructs and assembles parts of the product by implementing the Builder interface.

Node.name: Product
Node.Desc: Represents the complex object under construction.

Node.Text: For all objects in structure {\n builder->BuildPart()\n}
